objectives: Students will discuss hobbies and free time using Informal/Conversational register language
Students will engage with Thriller/Suspense themed scenarios related to hobbies and free time
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of informal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining hobbies and free time content with Thriller/Suspense narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore hobbies and free time through a Thriller/Suspense lens using Informal/Conversational language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a dangerous or threatening situation involving hobbies and free time

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice informal register vocabulary related to hobbies and free time in a thriller context
Students engage in thriller themed role-play about hobbies and free time using informal register
Students create original thriller themed content about hobbies and free time in informal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe hobbies and free time in a Thriller/Suspense scenario?
What suspense or threat might be involved in hobbies and free time?
Can you create a Thriller/Suspense story about hobbies and free time?
How does hobbies and free time change when viewed through a Thriller/Suspense perspective?
What informal register expressions would you use to discuss this thriller scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Thriller/Suspense situation involving hobbies and free time
roles: Character A: Using informal register in thriller context
Character B: Responding in informal register within thriller theme

topic_genre_blend: hobbies and free time with suspense
hobbies and free time with threat
hobbies and free time with danger

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Informal/Conversational throughout: Friendly, relaxed everyday speech
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Thriller/Suspense theme: Tension, danger, psychological intensity

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Informal/Conversational register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Thriller/Suspense themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of informal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
